name: SSTR - Third Experience
description:
This Experience is an excerpt of the full SSTR game.

SSTR is a logic puzzle game set onboard a mysterious colony ship whose AI is on a mission to exterminate every soul aboard. Using materials found throughout the ship you construct defenses to buy time in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

In this Experience, we took a break from the puzzles and focused on a feature we have not shown before.

Constructing Defenses.

She has found you and is hunting you down. Defend yourself and stay alive for as long as possible. 

If you have any feedback regarding the turrets and drones or have any suggestions on what we can improve, drop us a message down below or on the SSTR Discord server.

If you have not played the previous experiences, we suggest downloading the "All Experiences" installer to play everything released so far.

And stay tuned for the Fourth Experience coming just after New Years.

An installer containing all currently available Experiences can also be found below.
